div.p: A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-admin-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: The administration has started but has not yet completed.
Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".
All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.
Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

description.value: A set of codes indicating the current status of a MedicationAdministration.

definition.value: The administration has started but has not yet completed.
Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended".
All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.
Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
